    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.buyAnimal​(Farm farm, Animal a)

    Asks the player to choose a FoodItem to feed their chosen animal with and performs the action

    Calls the Farmer method to feed the animal
    void Farmer.feedTo​(Animal animal, FoodItem item)
    Feeds the animal the item and removes the item from the farmer's inventory
    void Farmer.playWith​(Animal animal)
    Wrapper method to allow the farmer to play with the animal
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.playWithAnimal​(Farmer farmer, Animal animal)
    Calls the Farmer method to play with the animal
    Method parameters in main with type arguments of type Animal 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.brokenFence​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals)
    The player loses one or more of their animals and the remaining animals lose a substantial amount of happiness
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.tendToLand​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals)
    Increases the maximum number of crops that can be grown on the farm and gives all animals a small happiness bonus
    static void UserInterface.viewAnimals​(java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals, boolean needsIndexes, boolean detailed)

    static void UserInterface.viewAvailableAnimals​(java.util.ArrayList<Animal> availableAnimals)
